articles.author: Venkata Krishna B
articles.title: Asia Cup: Bumrah, Kuldeep, Siraj and the rest – Indian bowling at its best in time for World Cup - The Indian Express
articles.description: On two successive nights, attack resembled a hungry pack due to pace spearhead’s return and wrist-spinner’s revival
articles.content: India are beginning to turn the heat on with the ball. Displays such as the one against Sri Lanka on Tuesday can be a catalyst to lift the mood, pouncing on every small window that the opposition ope… [+5569 chars]
